channel.title: [317]private messaging issue(help)[317]
channel.description:
hey everyone... i dont really know how to explain this so ill do the best i can
im having a problem with private messaging(oviously :P)
if i go on an account that has no powers(isnt staff) and i private message someone, they recive it.
but if i go on an account with powers(is staff) and i private message someone... they dont recive it.
i dont know what to do to fix this... i was told this was server sided...and im still a nub at this stuff lol :P
the client im using is a 317 btw, if that helps at all...
but if anyone can help me out thatd be great ;)
